overview: Han-seok traveled alone with his girlfriend. The place where he stayed was a guesthouse. However, the first thing you met at a guest house was the wisdom of a naked body?! Han-seok, who unintentionally flocks to a pervert thief and buys a misunderstanding, is resolved by Haruka, but continues to hate Wisdom. But Sato saw him like that. The perfume he developed has a special power, and he complains about it... What is the essence of the perfume...?
title: Delicious Sex And Sisters
